attributes.action: Launch an independent public enquiry into the anti-Brexit bias of the BBC
attributes.additional_details: The BBC is required to be impartial in its reporting. It is in breach of its Royal Charter. We call on the Home Secretary to launch a public enquiry to ensure this public broadcaster complies fully with the charter to ensure it does not undermine democratic processes in the UK.
attributes.background: The BBC’s reporting of Brexit is biased as evidenced by the disproportionate number of people appearing on it’s programmes who voted remain and the treatment of people who voted to leave. People on both sides of the argument must be given an equal opportunity to make their case.
